TEXT.TITLE: EASTEK CORP <ESTK.O> 1ST QTR SEPT 30 LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Shr loss 24 cts vs loss four cts Net loss 874,986 vs loss 56,182 Revs 402,855 vs not available NOTE: The company made its initial offering in March 1987 and before then had been a development stage company so no sales were posted in 1986. Reuter
